messages.content: What is the purpose of the StyleAligned Reference Sampler node?
The StyleAligned Reference Sampler node lets you reference an existing latent as a style reference.
How do you retrieve the latent to be referenced?
You need to perform DDIM inversion to retrieve the latent.
Which parameters control the degree of style sharing in the StyleAligned Reference Sampler node?
The `share_attn` and `share_norm` parameters control the components of self-attention and normalization that are shared.
What is the difference between applying and not applying the Batch Align node to a batch of generations?
Applying the Batch Align node aligns the style of the entire batch with the first image generated in the batch.
How do you install the StyleAligned nodes?
Simply download or git clone this repository in `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/`. Example workflows are included in `resources/`.
